thread.title: View on Arc de Triomphe night and day!
thread.title_full: View on Arc de Triomphe night and day! - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Patricia B
title: View on Arc de Triomphe night and day!
text: Great hospitality. Nice and cozy room with all amenities and great service! Breakfast buffet is awesome with incredible organic breads. Went for business but excellent for tourism too because great location: metro RER buses taxis out the door. And Farouk the concierge is very helpful. Merci!
